name: Boombastic Fall
description:
Welcome to the Boombastic Fall!

The game consists of a multiplayer game where the objective is to reach the bottom first.

Use W,A,S,D to control left character and SPACE to drop a bomb. Use Arrow Keys to control right character and keypad-0 to drop a bomb.

You can find three power ups in boxes like:

-Power enchant: increases the reach of the bomb.

-Lightning keys: reverses the enemy’s commands.

-Timeless Hourglass: temporarily stuns the enemy.

The player who achieves two victories first wins.
